uav.gcs.planner

Class HGA4m

  • java.lang.Object
    • uav.gcs.planner.Planner
      • uav.gcs.planner.HGA4m

  • public class HGA4m
extends Planner
    The class models the path planner HGA4m.

    version 3.0.0
    See Also:

             java.lang.String typeAircraft,
             java.lang.String stdPos)
        Class constructor - Used in HGA4m
        Parameters:
        drone - instance of the aircraft
        fileWaypointsMission - file with waypoints of mission
        numberRoutes - number of routes
        dirFiles - directory of main files
        fileGeoBase - name of file geoBase
        dirPlanner - planner directory
        cmdExecPlanner - command to exec the planner
        altitudeFlight - flight altitude cruising
        time - processing time
        delta - delta parameter/risk allocation
        maxVel - maximum speed
        maxCtrl - maximum control
        speedCruize - cruise speed
        typeAircraft - type of aircraft
        stdPos - standard deviation of drone position
        Since:
        version 3.0.0
